info.name: Pastel Rainbow Play Button For Roblox [READ DESC.]
info.description:
inspo: CraX_e621
sorry for telling this soooo late, but i just realized that to make my button theme work is to install the original button theme made by CraX_e621 first  [ https://userstyles.org/styles/177000/rainbow-play-button-for-roblox ]

 after u install CraX_e621's theme. you can install my pastel button already
itll work properly if u follow these steps :)

p.s thx to vqlccn for commenting abt how it works :)

edit 02/28/2022: 
Hello, i am so sorry that i dissapointed some of y'all. i was still trying to code the time i uploaded this which is on 2020 and i just did this for my own profile in roblox, and after years i stopped updating them since i already lost inspo, you can uninstall the style if it doesnt work or you think this is just nonsense. thank you for ur time <333
